revised_title: On the Power of Penetrating into Space by Telescopes and Comparative Determination of Extent of that Power in Natural Vision and Telescopes
tldr: The author investigates the power of telescopes to penetrate space and compares it to the extent of that power in natural vision. The study examines the nature of luminous bodies and the method of vision at a distance, concluding that brightness is defined by the product of the luminous body's copiousness and the number of physical points.
